issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: The problem is a duplicate of an existing issue.
resolution.name: Duplicate

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Once the DOM ready event fires, we need change the height of the <html> and <body> tag from 100% to the height in pixels of the browser window.

This becomes a problem on Android tablets when the URL bar is focused and the keyboard pops up which shrinks the size of the page.

Also investigate the location bar and JavaScript console bars on iOS.
fields.summary: MobileWeb: Override the html and body tag height with the browser's height when DOM ready
